lines.text: Enter PISTOL, Hostess, NYM, BARDOLPH, and Boy

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: Prithee, honeysweet husband, let me bring thee to Staines.

lines.speaker: pistol
lines.text: No for my manly heart doth yearn. Bardolph, be blithe: Nym, rouse thy vaunting veins: Boy, bristle thy courage up for Falstaff he is dead, And we must yearn therefore.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Would I were with him, wheresomeer he is, either in heaven or in hell!

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: Nay, sure, hes not in hell: hes in Arthurs bosom, if ever man went to Arthurs bosom. A made a finer end and went away an it had been any christom child a parted even just between twelve and one, even at the turning o the tide: for after I saw him fumble with the sheets and play with flowers and smile upon his fingers ends, I knew there was but one way for his nose was as sharp as a pen, and a babbled of green fields. How now, sir John! quoth Iwhat, man! be o good cheer. So a cried out God, God, God! three or four times. Now I, to comfort him, bid him a should not think of God I hoped there was no need to trouble himself with any such thoughts yet. So a bade me lay more clothes on his feet: I put my hand into the bed and felt them, and they were as cold as any stone then I felt to his knees, and they were as cold as any stone, and so upward and upward, and all was as cold as any stone.

lines.speaker: nym
lines.text: They say he cried out of sack.

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: Ay, that a did.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: And of women.

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: Nay, that a did not.

lines.speaker: boy
lines.text: Yes, that a did and said they were devils incarnate.

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: A could never abide carnation twas a colour he never liked.

lines.speaker: boy
lines.text: A said once, the devil would have him about women.

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: A did in some sort, indeed, handle women but then he was rheumatic, and talked of the whore of Babylon.

lines.speaker: boy
lines.text: Do you not remember, a saw a flea stick upon Bardolphs nose, and a said it was a black soul burning in hellfire

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Well, the fuel is gone that maintained that fire: thats all the riches I got in his service.

lines.speaker: nym
lines.text: Shall we shog the king will be gone from Southampton.

lines.speaker: pistol
lines.text: Come, lets away. My love, give me thy lips. Look to my chattels and my movables: Let senses rule the word is Pitch and Pay: Trust none For oaths are straws, mens faiths are wafercakes, And holdfast is the only dog, my duck: Therefore, Caveto be thy counsellor. Go, clear thy c rystals. Yokefellows in arms, Let us to France like horseleeches, my boys, To suck, to suck, the very blood to suck!

lines.speaker: boy
lines.text: And thats but unwholesome food they say.

lines.speaker: pistol
lines.text: Touch her soft mouth, and march.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Farewell, hostess.
Kissing her

lines.speaker: nym
lines.text: I cannot kiss, that is the humour of it but, adieu.

lines.speaker: pistol
lines.text: Let housewifery appear: keep close, I thee command.

lines.speaker: hostess
lines.text: Farewell adieu.
Exeunt
